responsibilities.general: Improved and helped maintain the ProjectOne search application and web page.
responsibilities.newspaper: Specifically aided in the newspapers section built using Django and utilizing the search engine Apache Solr.
responsibilities.openSeaDragon: Also extensively used the JavaScript library OpenSeadragon to view digitized newspaper articles and perform article clippings to be downloaded.

loc.imageAlt: loc.gov website on the newspapers section for searching American archives.

responsibilities.general: Aided in the development of a new web platform for the Copyright Office to allow for the submission of new copyrights online.

copyright.imageAlt: Copyright Recordation site for submitting and processing copyrights.

artemis.summary: Developed and maintained web applications for the Library of Congress allowing for the search of web archives and the submission of new copyrights.
